works.description:
The work in question is an image of a  
screenshot that we took with details on an individual license.  At the  
bottom of our article, you will notice a screenshot.

The blog Ziggyflo has stolen our image, put it on her site and claimed  
credit for the work that we did.  I sent a DMCA complaint last year to  
Google where Ziggyflo used our image prior without our consent and it was 

taken down by Google upon our complaint.  With Ziggyflo's actions this is 

now the second time she has violated our copyright on our site, and  
furthermore this is now the second time we have filed a DMCA complaint  
against Ziggyflo.  I ask that you take necessary action by removing the  
infringing material, and furthermore take necessary action against
Ziggyflo  
as this is now a repeat offense.  Ziggyflo's use of our material can be  
located at the link provided under infringement and by clicking her link  

titled Polly Kahl's License expired claiming she took the screenshot  
herself when in fact she did not.
